## statConfR: Models of Decision Confidence and Metacognition


The statConfR R package provides fitting functions and other tools for decision confidence and
metacognition researchers, including meta-d′/d′ ([Maniscalco and Lau,
2012](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1053810011002303)),
often considered to be the gold standard to measure metacognitive
efficiency. Also allows to fit nine different static models of decision
making and confidence to test the model underlying meta-d′/d′ and many
applications of signal detection theory [(see Rausch et al.,
2023)](../publications/Rausch%20(2023)%20Accepted%20author%20manuscript.pdf){target="_blank"}.<br />
**Authors**: Manuel Rausch, [Sebastian
Hellmann](https://www.ku.de/ppf/psychologie/psychologie2/mitarbeitende/hellmann)<br />
**Maintainer**: Manuel Rausch<br /> **Development version**: <https://github.com/ManuelRausch/StatConfR><br /> **Release version**: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/statConfR/index.html><br />**Bug Reports**:
<https://github.com/ManuelRausch/StatConfR/issues>
**Citable Paper**: Rausch, M., & Hellmann, S. (2024). statConfR: An R Package for Static Models of Decision Confidence and Metacognition. PsyArXiv. doi:10.31234/osf.io/dk6mr \| [pre-print](https://osf.io/preprints/psyarxiv/dk6mr){target="_blank"}<br />

## dynConfiR: Dynamic Models for Confidence and Response Time Distributions

The dynConfiR R package provides density functions for the joint distribution of
choice, response time and confidence for discrete confidence judgments as well as functions for parameter fitting, prediction and simulation for various dynamical models of decision confidence (see [Hellmann et al., 2023](../publications/Hellmann%20(2023)%20Accepted%20Author%20Manuscript.pdf){target="_blank"}, and [Hellmann et al., 2024](https://osf.io/preprints/psyarxiv/5ze8t/download){target="_blank"}, for detailed explanations of the different models), including the dynaViTE model, the dynWEV model, the 2DSD model [(Pleskac & Busemeyer, 2010)](https://doi.org/10.1037/a0019737){target="_blank"}, and several race models.<br />**Authors**: [Sebastian
Hellmann](https://www.ku.de/ppf/psychologie/psychologie2/mitarbeitende/hellmann),
Manuel Rausch<br /> **Maintainer**: [Sebastian
Hellmann](https://www.ku.de/ppf/psychologie/psychologie2/mitarbeitende/hellmann)<br />**Development version**: <https://github.com/SeHellmann/dynConfiR><br /> **Release version**: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/dynConfiR/index.html><br />
**Bug Reports**: <https://github.com/SeHellmann/dynConfiR/issues>
